t: Best drones in 2025 | Tom's Guide
s: 1 day ago - I believe the best drone overall is the DJI Air 3S. While not much has changed from the Air 3, you're getting amazing 4K video with great low-light performance, and even better stills, thanks to its dual-camera setup. However, because of its weight, you'll need to register it with the FAA.
